name: noahleft's projects
body:
Hello, I'm Noah. These are side projects to help friends and to survey new technique. 

Online Judge System is the first side project during my master degree. It's created for TAs to check students' code efficiently. 
Usage: Python, SQLite

Sale System (web) is born to help my parents who are not familiar to computers. This side project uses Python simple-HTTP server to provide localhost service. 
Usage: Python, SQLite

NightMarket@Tainan (iOS)
Usage: Swift

Sale System (mac)
Usage: Swift, SQLite
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
